answers.answer: I had a 1hr one at 16weeks and them a 3hr one at 32weeks because I switched doctors because I moved
I was 25 weeks when i had mine done, you should be ok. they wouldn't make u go thru wit it if was too soon
I had mine at 25 weeks and its just as accurate by this stage. I'm now 35+5 and healthy!! Baby boys great too!
Yes, It will be accurate. According to this app, (I'm Expecting) It says the test can be given 24-28 weeks. But It's usually given around 26-28 weeks.
It can be accurate whatever stage you are, if you're pregnant or not. Some ladies get it much sooner if they've had history of diabetes or their family does.

question: Does the glucose work accurately at 24 weeks? BC everyone I've heard from has had theirs at 28 weeks?
title: glucose test
